text: Az nisonahoi dustii onho ʙa musalmonon on ast, ki guruhe az onho on ciro, ki ʙar pajomʙar nozil suda, ʙisnavand, casmonason ʙa saʙaʙi on ci az haq sinoxtand, pur az ask mesavad, ki on haq va az nazdi Parvardigor ast va ʙa Alloh imon meovarand va rasuli Uro pajravi mekunand va megujand: "Ej Parvardigori mo, imon ovardem, moro niz dar zumrai guvohidihandagon ʙinavis
